Description: Directed by George Cukor.  With Spencer Tracy, Deborah Kerr, Ian Hunter, James Donald. Arnold Boult is determined to make his son a success at all costs. He commits arson, causes two suicides, and bribes people. His wife, unable to leave him, becomes alcoholic and dies. His son is killed. After doing time in prison he searches for his illegitimate grandson.
